Description: Rest on flight into Egypt, after Poussin: the Holy Family resting among ruins, with Joseph sleeping at left, and Christ child and Mary receiving food from two angels kneeling at right; two cherubs hovering above them and scattering flowers, elephant standing at right; donkey at left; open letter proof c.1787 Etching and engraving
Bibliographic references: Andresen 1863 / Nicolaus Poussin - Verzeichniss der nach seinen Gemälden Gefertigten... (153.III)
Palmerini 1824 / Opere d'intaglio del Cav. Raffaello Morghen (131)
Associated names: Associated with: Ferdinand III, Grand Duke of Tuscany, Archduke of Austria
Acquisition notes: Part of the collection of the works of Raphael Morghen formed by Jacopo Tarnia
